original_text: (But any vow of a widow or of a divorced woman, anything by which she has bound herself, shall stand against her.)
korean_text: 과부나 이혼 당한 여자의 서원이나 그가 결심한 모든 서약은 지킬 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But any vow of a widow or of a divorced woman
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 과부나 이혼한 여자의 서원은 무엇이든지

sentences.original_text: anything by which she has bound herself
